Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute at 51st/Western
ShortDescription: 51 51st buses are rerouted via 51st, Western Boulevard, 47th, California, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to police activity near 51st/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Western Boulevard, 47th, California, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to police activity near 51st/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison rr WB via Congress, Kostner, Jackson, Cicero & Harrison; EB via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, 5th & Harrison due to blockage nr Harrison/Kolmar

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Harrison/Kolmar.

Westbound buses will operate via Congress, Kostner, Jackson, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Harrison.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner, 5th Ave., then resume their normal route on Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.
